dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into smaller, manageable parts and analyze each component systematically.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to identify patterns and make connections between seemingly unrelated concepts.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prefer to learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as diagrams, charts, and videos.
Your FarTwin will learn best through listening to explanations, lectures, and audio content.

dimensions.label: Career Aspirations
dimensions.description: What professional goals does your FarTwin strive for?

options.description: Your FarTwin will aim to take on leadership roles, managing teams and making strategic decisions.
Your FarTwin will pursue careers that allow for artistic expression, innovation, and imagination.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin navigate social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confidently express their opinions, needs, and boundaries in a straightforward manner.
Your FarTwin will prefer to observe and listen before contributing to conversations, taking time to reflect on their thoughts and feelings.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage their schedule?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on structured planning tools, such as calendars and to-do lists, to stay organized.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, adjusting their schedule as needed to accommodate new priorities or unexpected events.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express themselves in writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate complex ideas and thoughts clearly and efficiently, using straightforward language.
Your FarTwin will use vivid imagery and storytelling techniques to bring their writing to life, engaging readers with sensory details.

dimensions.label: Creativity Expression
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will create and appreciate art, music, and other forms of creative expression that bring them joy.
Your FarTwin will channel their creativity into problem-solving, innovation, and hands-on projects that make a tangible impact.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin handle disagreements or conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly challenge opposing views and assert their own perspectives, often taking a strong stance.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground and work with others to find mutually beneficial solutions, prioritizing cooperation over confrontation.
